name: Solitaire Lounge
summary:
Come play a modern Solitaire game based on classic Solitaire rules! ★★★★★

This is a modern Solitaire game with special effects and beautiful themes. It uses classic Solitaire rules and anyone can quickly pickup and play this game.

★★★ Adventure Mode ★★★

Play through adventure mode to unlock new themes and challenges!

★★★ Leaderboard ★★★

Work your way up the leaderboard with your high scores.
